channel.title: Dexerty 317/474 - Working Mini-games, All working skills, 24/7, Economy, + MORE!
channel.description:
[center]Welcome to the Dexerty advertisement thread![/center] [center]Dexerty is a server that is designed for the player. Dexerty is an economy server, with loads of features including skills, bosses and mini-games. You can do whatever pleases you on Dexerty, such as go questing, PvP with some of your friends, or maybe just hang and chat! The server is economized strategically so that no item that can be obtained by a boss or minigame, is in a shop. Another great concept is our PvP system. We have designed it so that when you kill someone, you get a random number out of 5, PvP Points. This provides the thrill we all loved when we k03d that special someone in the wilderness. We hope you enjoy your stay at Dexerty! What are you waiting for read the rest of the advertisement![/center]
[center] Webclient: [url=http://dexerty.com/webclient]http://dexerty.com/webclient[/url] Downloadable client: [url=http://dexerty.com/download.php]http://dexerty.com/download.php[/url][/center] [center]Forums (Coming soon): [url=http://dexerty.com/forums]http://dexerty.com/forums[/url][/center]
[center]Features:
Mage Following Range Following Clipped Projectiles Clipped Following Clipped Npcs Reworked Defence Formulas - PvP Reworked Attack Formulas - PvP & PvN Amazing Switching Rewritten Fishing Gem Cutting Improved Woodcutting Mining Smelting Smithing Fletching Herblore Agility Firemaking Crafting Fishing & Cooking Prayer Correct Drops PvP Point System PvP Point Shops Old School Styled Pest Control Barrows Great Dagganoth Caves Cook's Assistant Quest Slayer Skill with Slayer Gem Working Ice Queen Lair Chaos Elemental King Black Dragon Tzhaar Cave Correct Demon Models All Doors Working All Ladders Working Custom Donator Crown Working Custom Server Name Image in Chatbox New Friends & Ignore Lists & A LOT MORE![/center]
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ro3pl1.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/21lkis3.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2e34p3q.png[/img][/center] [center][size=14pt]Do you want to see more Dexerty has to offer? Come play now and check out the rest! :)[/size][/center]

item.title: Dexerty 317/474 - Working Mini-games, All working skills, 24/7, Economy, + MORE!
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“defer48, post:5, topic:478208”][quote author=Douzle link=topic=596406.msg4199376#msg4199376 date=1357954670]

Looks could but tbh you shouldn’t have put it up without a forums yet!

Whys that? It’s to play the game not to post on a forum we will have it up by tomorrow.
[/quote]
Good point but if people have problems etc there is no way to get help and things can be very unorganized. I’m not trying to start an argument lol it looks like a good server.[/quote]
Because they cant post on this can they. Noooo, that’s way to complicated.

Read full topic

[center]Welcome to the Dexerty advertisement thread![/center]
[center]Dexerty is a server that is designed for the player. Dexerty is an economy server, with loads of features including skills, bosses and mini-games. You can do whatever pleases you on Dexerty, such as go questing, PvP with some of your friends, or maybe just hang and chat! We hope you enjoy your stay at Dexerty! What are you waiting for read the rest of the advertisement![/center]
